website_summaries.verdict: Instead of three smaller pockets, this net features one large envelope – great for longer items like baseball bats and folding chairs.
pros: Cargo net stretches around your belongings
Mounting hardware included for two installation options
cons: If you don't have pre-installed cargo hooks, manufacturer recommends drilling into your vehicle to install them

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered this cargo net because I just bought a new suv and did not want anything falling out of the back when I opened the hatch. As was stated, the cargo net fits any vehicle. It is adjustable and has hooks that came with it that attach to it and hook to the side rings (if you have them). Also comes with other ways to attach it if you do not have hooks. I thought it was just a net but was pleasantly surprised to see that it opens up and you can put smaller items it so they do not slide around. It is just what I wanted and more. So glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I wish it had the option to use the clip/hook and the loop, rather than having to remove the clip to use the loop. The plastic parts fall apart easily and the net doesn't seem to touch the bottom of the trunk when stretched out, so things can still fall out of the car. Had to come up with a way to attach a hook to hold it down from the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Thaisval

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cargo net
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied. Product as described with attaching hardware. Received in the specified time frame. Easy to install. I installed it in a Jeep Cherokee Latitude as a grocery catcher net on the back of the tailgate. My vehicle came with two similar installation buttons on each side at the top of the gate. I installed two of the provided buttons at the bottom with the adhesive strip with a couple of drops of super glue to handle the tension. I did want to drill using the screws. Works great and I am positive it would work just as well for the other suggested uses. bob f
customer_reviews.author: Ryobi

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a storage solution in the back of my hatchback - to keep some essentials from rolling around, as my trunk is normally otherwise empty. Pulled off the plastic clips from the top of the product, and hooked the elastic straps around the existing hooks in my vehicle. The netting works well, seems sturdy enough, and for the price I paid, I cannot complain about it in any way. I suspect the plastic clips might not hold up to abuse long term, but for light use I do not think they are unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: George Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible
customer_reviews.text: The attachment doesn't work with the clips in my suv. I had to maneuver to attach it and I don't know if it's going to just slide off. For now I got it to work. Wish the attachment pieces were more universal. This is also small than expected. I wish it was a few inches longer. This looks like it goes to a much smaller trunk. My suv is medium-smallish and this was still on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: For Yukon Denali ‘15 It works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Feb 2019 for my Yukon Denali 2015. It has to stretch to reach both sides and works great. It feels very sturdy and nice. The net is a pouch so things don’t slide around but also a barrier for other items in the back of my SUV. There is the possibility of smaller things sliding underneath the net and out because there is no hooks in the center bottom of the vehicle or net. You could always make a make-shift hook in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Missing fasteners. Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The net is great, however some of the mounting hardware was missing upon arrival. The picture states that ALL mounting accessories are included. However the 4 screws and retainers shown in the same picture were missing. I will keep the cargo net because it is well made, but when I buy a product online I expect that it to 100% complete. Because of this I would not do business with this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: The Pen

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect width and fits flawlessy right up against the backseat.
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! Exactly what I was looking for for our 2018 Ford Focus hatchback. It is the perfect width and fits flawlessy right up against the backseat. I attached the top anchors to the top seat anchors and I had to modify the lower attachment a bit and attach to a spot where the backseat folds and meets the trunk floor. Just fold the seat forward to expose the metal seat bracket (where the seat and truck floor meet). So happy with this net!!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherC

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product, works well for large SUV
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2007 Lincoln Navigator and I was afraid that the net would be too small when I took it out of its package but after installing the hooks directly into the car, I can say this product is sturdy and amazing. I was always dropping milk out of my trunk because there was no net and this is a really great price for a great product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JaMarLo

customer_reviews.title: works well!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a Subaru Ascent and the trunk pretty small. I needed a net to help keep things that I stacked from rolling out when I opened the trunk. I first went to Subaru's website to get one specifically for the Ascent and they wanted $56!! Decided to check Amazon next and found this one to try, its been working great! Holds my baby's stroller in place so that when I open the trunk it does not tip out.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for wider trunks
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 Honda Accord and this net was not capable to be of use. It is way too short spanning from right to left. Every time I attempted to stretch it and secure the other end, it would snap off and pop towards me. I am not gonna use it and am gonna look for something more box like for trunk separation and storage. I didn’t want to leave this feedback but I keep getting emails asking my thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: W. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and does the trick. Cheap parts though.
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Santa Fe perfectly. One problem has arisen with the item. There are plastic pieces that help keep the net tension in the corners. They pop off very easily and can just as easily get lost. Mine did. Wish I could get spare parts without buying a whole new net.
customer_reviews.author: George Ell

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: This trunk storage net seems to be pretty good. If you have existing closed tie down points and are having to use the plastic hooks, consider adding approximately 1/2 to 1 inch to the dimensions. I have installed it in a 2016 Kia Forte5 flat in the hatchback floor and have put a milk crate sized box with auto supplies under it. It does the job and my box longer slides around when driving., I will try to update this posting later to comment on its durability as it is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Waterscape

customer_reviews.title: I installed this product easily in my 2013 Chevrolet Impala
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product easily in my 2013 Chevrolet Impala. Since there were 2 screws already holding the trunk lining in place, I did not need to use the included mounting pieces. I really like the Cargo Net as it is strong, well built and the top is tight ensuring small items placed within the net do not fall out. The only other cargo net I have had was in my 1997 El Dorado and it was not as well-made as this one. You cannot go wrong with this product or this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Trunk storage net works well
customer_reviews.text: I really like the trunk storage net. It fit very well in my Honda and holds all the things that had been moving around in my trunk nicely in place. It came with mounting screws which I choose not to use but will store in case I want to use them later. It came with 4 hooks which I used to install it (installation was a breeze). I hooked the top two onto my seat retainers and the bottom two onto my car's cargo clips. It is flexible so I can put more into it if I need to. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: "I netted a good one"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it is a fraction of the price of Hyundai's product for my Tucson. As luck would have it, the fit is perfect, seems like it will be more than durable and it took a whopping 3 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The net is good but I wish someone would do something about the ...
customer_reviews.text: The net is good but I wish someone would do something about the mounting options. For sedans, sometimes there are no hooks so you have to drill the given screw into the car body or the inside. No one wants to drill a hole into their baby for a ~$10 net unless it was a major operation. Although there is the adhesive option, the net is stretched from left to right, creating hard tension on the flexible line. There is no way the adhesive can hold that tension. Mine fell out in less than 5 minutes of net being hooked on. Newer cars have push clip options, I guess manufacturer can use that as an advantage for designing hooks.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I saved because my car dealers cargo nets are a rip off. This one comes with everything you need. JUST MAKE SURE YOU MEASURE and order the appropriate size.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Seems to well made.
customer_reviews.text: The net seems to be well made but I have not used it to secure anything yet. That being said the only thing I got was the net, meaning I did not get the mounting parts. I was not planning on drilling holes in my new Equinox anyway. I will post more if I feel it is necessary later.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: I had a fellow male friend install it and he used a power drill for the screws.  It worked nicely.
customer_reviews.text: First of all I loved the price. I was going to order one from my auto dealership and the price they quoted me was $238.00. I figured I would try yours for the price you were asking. I was very pleased. It’s a good product and seems to be of value. I haven’t had it very long.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Gauss

customer_reviews.title: A bit unstable
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected but stretch to fit. The big issue I had with it is the hooks to mount the net don't provide A+ secure connection. Although it hasn't happened yet, I feel if it was loaded to maximum capacity that it would probably come loose from the hook spilling the contents of the net
customer_reviews.author: BBG

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A MUST HAVE IN A LARGE STORAGE SPACE
customer_reviews.text: I love to have a space to keep items in the trunk from sliding all around and where I can find what I need instantly. I am a Home Health Nurse and my trunk is full of supplies but I use the net to keep what I need handy and right where I can find them instantly.
customer_reviews.author: James Ondricek

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and you can't beat the price. I own an HR, and certainly can't afford the one the manufacturer offers. This one has a really nice pocket feature that you can place smaller items in-between the two nets. I have cargo rings so I didn't need to install the hardware that was included, but the instructions appeared to be clear and concise. I am very happy with this purchase and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Berg

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed, nothing I didn't. Easily installed on my existing mounts. Holds items securely inside as well as behind. I no longer have to worry about things falling out as the back door opens.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M. Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Fit...
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered in lieu of original equipment for my Hyundai Tucson. Way too much work require to retrofit. I returned for credit and purchased Hyundai Original replacement. Well worth the extra money. This unit may work if you don’t have original equipment alternative.
customer_reviews.author: sfpsdave

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the $
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it said it would accomplish. I use it to tote my groceries home from the store so they don't spill all over the back of my car. It fits nicely in the back of my new '17 Honda CR-V. It's nice to know you don't have to spend the $50 to buy the Honda version of this product. $15 for this is a good buy for the money. Also, it seems like this product is well made, but I've only used it for a handful of weeks. The product was delivered to me within 3 days. Fast!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F Katz

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in my 2017 Subaru Forester
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my 2017 Subaru Forester. Now I don't have to worry about groceries falling out when I open the hatch. I would recommend this cargo net to anyone with the need. Easy to install. It took a matter of seconds. Comes with mounting hardware if your car doesn't have hooks for something like this. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Arcane Radio

customer_reviews.title: no more objects moving around
customer_reviews.text: I love this on my Durango. we buy food at store where there is no bags, so this is super handy. i recommend it
customer_reviews.author: yunis

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: We put this in the back of my hubby SUV and it works really well. We love how it keep everything from not falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and easy to collapse
customer_reviews.text: The cargo space behind the 3rd row seats in our expedition makes grocery hauling tough This solution keeps stuff from moving around. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: JiminGA

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: We use our net a bit differently than in the photo. We attached ours horizontally in our Rav 4 to the factory installed clips. We didn't want to make any permanent changes to the car by way of drilling,etc, so this is the best solution we could come up with. However, we can still place bottles inside it and they don't roll. Also, it's not in our way when not in use; it lays flat on the floor and we can place things on top if we don't want them in the net.
customer_reviews.author: CRW

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this netting to keep things from sliding around in the back of the SUV. I have an Audi Q5 and the netting that I found specifically for this vehicle were outragiously priced $100+. This does the same thing for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: A1 service and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something like this for a while now and was so excited when I seen it on the lightening deals. Product arrived very fast. Even received a thank you email from the company. Item is very good quality with easy instruction on how to install. Would recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Fits in 2007 4Runner
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my 2007 4Runner Sport edition and was able to get it to fit with the existing mounts, no need for the included adapters, so I might just use those adapters somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Jake O.

customer_reviews.title: The net is made from a good quality material
customer_reviews.text: The net is made from a good quality material, I liked it, however I couldn't use ot because the glue of the accesories that it supposed to stick on sides to hang it with is not strong enough so it falls when hanging. It came with screws but I am not going to drill holes to the sides of my SUV trunk to make it stay.
customer_reviews.author: Newbietech

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I expected. It stops groceries from rolling around in the back of my SUV. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not for backend 9Audi Q5
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit a Audi Q5 at the back end edge of the trunk. It fits only behind the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra W.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my groceries from spilling out the back when i open the hatch!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do! I was nervous about it not fitting in my 2011 4runner, but it stretches just fine. My SUV already had anchors on either side making installation easy, and then I figured out a nifty way to anchor it down on the bottom as well without screwing into my car. I gave it 4 stars though because if i would of had to screw into my car I would have been disappointed. Perhaps some industrial suction cups as another option would have been good! But like i said, my car already had anchors. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Product received in good condition and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Product received in good condition and good quality. The description is as stated online. Helps to prevent items from rolling out when opening the hatch of my SUV which I have experienced. Did not have to install the hooks that were provided since I already had them in the SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Babs1

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband suv does the job holds the groceries in place in won't fall over or anything.
customer_reviews.author: S.&D.

customer_reviews.title: so it's now useless.
customer_reviews.text: It never worked as well in my Honda CR-V as a I had hoped, but it was serviceable for a few months, provided I didn't put much stuff inside the net or stretch it very far over larger items. Then one of the pieces broke, so it's now useless.
customer_reviews.author: OHProf

customer_reviews.title: Something so simple makes a big difference!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected! Works great in my 2015 Pathfinder....seems like groceries always sliding out when back is opened up and never fails it's something breakable...problem solved...great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly across my 2014 Nissan Murano. My husband used a couple carabiners to connect it to the loops in my trunk so I can't speak to the quality of the connecting materials it came with. Hold groceries well without them sliding everywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Ellison

customer_reviews.title: The correct  instructions  thks 2 mgf
customer_reviews.text: By ordrink the correct size and having the proper hareware it was very simple thks
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: It is absolutely perfect and fits into my Buick Encore SUV
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely perfect and fits into my Buick Encore SUV. No more groceries flying around in the back. Also, it creates a pocket for light storage the way I use it. I keep my insulated grocery bags in it so that they are handy when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Loucinda

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: First off I can remove it if need be. It's sturdy, stretches and to my surprise holds a lot of stuff. Didn't use the adhering parts as my vehicle has hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Lilypat

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be made from good quality material
customer_reviews.text: This fits my SUV very well. It seems to be made from good quality material. Its cost was less than 1/3 of the cost of similar product from dealer. This will prevent stuff from falling back. You can also put stuff inside the pocket of this net and that will prevent stuff from rolling around in the truck of SUV.
customer_reviews.author: NEERAJ GUPTA

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Then net seemed durable when I installed it. One if the contact point broke with it a few months of use. I was able to tie the pieces together and they seem more solid now that before
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Mesh net hammock for cargo storage in van
customer_reviews.text: We got this to cover the overhead compartments inside our camper van. Product appeared smaller than the photo and it doesn't quite cover each end of overhead compartment in camper van (gap of a few inches on each side), but overall it works well enough to keep the big items from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Godfrey-lane

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: It fit the Forester perfectly. My 14 year old out it on the cars existing hooks no problem
customer_reviews.author: K. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Seems to Fit the 2017 Toyota RAV4 very easily
customer_reviews.text: I have just put it on a 2017 Toyota RAV4, and it installed reasonably well with the hooks that came (but no drilling or screws were necessary). I haven't used it much, but even if used only once in a while the cost is worth it. Certainly it is better to buy this net than pay the dealer $49 for substantially similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Pina C. Masciarelli-Patel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for a mesh net at the BACK of the trunk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Toyota Rav 4 hybrid. The hybrid has a battery compartment in the back that is about 3 inches higher than the rest of the truck. So the very back slopes up a bit. This makes it hard to put anything back there because it rolls down. So a mesh net is necessary to string across the back. Toyota has one’s ( supposedly) for this use but it actually is only build for securing at the front of the back area ( next to the trunk door). But this one came with screws and hangers which allowed the mesh to be hung where I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne A

customer_reviews.title: Nice and tight! Not overly stretchy.
customer_reviews.text: This fit the trunk of my 2017 QX80 perfectly. The others I ordered were too loose to keep stuff from falling out of the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: krisristen

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for a car but not an SUV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in the back of our 2016 4Runner and there is no way it fits. Stretched to 100% I am still lacking 2 inches. Oh, and let’s not forget that you have to drill the anchors into your trunk. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: HoganK

customer_reviews.title: Well made cargo net.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach and appears to be well made. Holds bags or items inside it really well. Seems like a quality product that will last a good while. The net does stretch quite a bit so does seem to accommodate different sized openings. Would purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: LuigiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice not and its doing exactly what its supposed to do. Keeps my groceries and other items from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Luther Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit too narrow for my vehicle and vehicle did it not have all needed mounting brackets in place. Decided not to install with vendor provided brackets as would require drilling holes. I purchased net with idea of installing just inside SUV back hatch door but changed location to the cargo side of SUV back seat backs. Very functional and looks good in that location.
customer_reviews.author: GRIER KILLOUGH

customer_reviews.title: Simple and essential.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this into the trunk up against the back of the seat of my 2011 Outback and so far so good. Had to only drill a couple holes into the plastic to get two corners of the net to mount and it went smoothly. Have stuffed a lot in it including jack stands and my camping tent and it's holding firmly. We will see how it holds over time but it's perfect in it's current state.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2012 Dodge Grand Caravan perfectly and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JEllo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves it for our Toyota Highlander. No issues
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this for my Acura MDX
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this for my Acura MDX. First, I think it was not big enough, as there were large gaps in the sides. More, the instructions for installing it were not at all clear. I installed it as best I could and it kept popping off. I ended up returning it after several days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great but not awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Durable and flexible. Only thing I didn’t like were the mounting hooks. I have a ‘13 Ford Escape and I have four built in but at the bottom (so my net would lay flat). I wanted my net to be like the picture but the mounting ware that came with wouldn’t stick and I didn’t want to permanently screw them in. So I settled for having my net lie flat which works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Drielle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Fit 2019 Chevy Equinox
customer_reviews.text: 2019 Chevy Equinox - didn't fit. Nothing positioned in the car to hook the net to. Probably either going to buy the factory one that lists for $55 or get by without it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike De Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Very good item!
customer_reviews.text: Used in Chevrolet Traverse and does job perfectly. Seems very versatile.Great price and seems well made. Won't be afraid to try other items of this brand and seller.
customer_reviews.author: japadu

customer_reviews.title: Storage net fit my 2018 Camary
customer_reviews.text: Had to remove the plastic clips from the net so that the net would connect to the net holder that is built in the Camary.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to install and is durable. The quality of the net is great and is perfect for holding groceries or other objects that roll around in the trunk. I had hooks already on the sides of the trunk so there was no. We’d to drill the screw in. Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Cina

customer_reviews.title: Met Requirments for Less Cost
customer_reviews.text: Desired to replace a GM vehicle cargo net with a bigger version. The Lebogner storage net specs/dimensions were dead on so I was able to fulfill my requirements at a price substantially less than the offerings from GM. Quality was the same as the GM with two more attachment methods provided - the OEM attachment method worked the best as expected.
customer_reviews.author: mrgmsc

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these at double the price from the dealer for one of my cars. I just purchased another car and decided to try it out on Amazon & compare quality. I am very happy with this product and it is the same quality as the one I purchased from dealer. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions Included
customer_reviews.text: Came with no instructions so I have no clue how to install it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit Ford Escape as advertised. Threw away. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: S. West

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little funny in my Envision. Not a fan of drilling holes in my trunk so I didn't. Doesn't fit like it looks in photo using the hooks already installed in the car; I'll make it work. (Need to attach the hooks to the net.)
customer_reviews.author: Tenth Watch

customer_reviews.title: Easy storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this trunk storage net. It was very easy to install. It keeps things from sliding all over my trunk. It's sturdy and can be mounted anywhere in the trunk. Still leaves lots of room open. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gail B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Seriously took me 25 seconds to put it in and so far it seems as good as if not better than the factory net.
customer_reviews.author: K. Foster

customer_reviews.title: The netting is not of good quality
customer_reviews.text: The outter perimeter band is of decent quality with the hooks, but the netting itself is of poor quality, loose, and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: High quality, fits great in a 2012 Subaru Forester
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in my 2012 Subaru Forester. The material seems high quality. Springy, snaps tight.
customer_reviews.author: T. Blikstad

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my '17 Chevy Traverse
customer_reviews.text: I have a 201$ Chevy Traverse.This cargo net is very worth having. Not only it's quality but the price and the fit is like the car dealer parts. I'm glad I bought this instead from the dealer which cost less than half the price. I definitely recommmwnd this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Now i don’t worry about things falling outta the car
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Missing a Few Items
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of putting a net in my trunk but I didnt not receieve anything but the net, I did not receive the parts for the screw in option so i cannot even install this into my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fit right into the already installed hooks on my Chevy Traverse.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my SUV
customer_reviews.text: This net is great! I installed it into my Mazda CX-5 and it was basically a seamless fit. Now the stuff I keep in my car will be kept from sliding all around my trunk area. Great product for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and sturdy. Easy to install without drilling any holes and holds items well.
customer_reviews.author: celia johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very strong webbing helps keep stuff from falling out of my hatchback. Worth the price. Excellent product will save money by avoiding loose cargo breakage and keep things in place.
customer_reviews.author: NJTechie

customer_reviews.title: Extreme value for great product
customer_reviews.text: Great fitment and utility for my XT4 as opposed to spending 4 times as much for the overpriced Cadillac one
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have to use any of the parts sent with the net. My Telluride already had everything I needed to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coming apart
customer_reviews.text: The little plastic pieces that hold the ends together keep popping off and they're hard to find and a pain to put back together. The net cannot seem to hold much inside the netting without coming apart. I'm super frustrated and now it's too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE IT IN MY SUV, BUT HAVE NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE IT IN MY SUV, BUT HAVE NOT USED IT. I KNOW IT IS GOING TO BE JUST FIND AND WILL WORK WELL. I WILL HAVE TO FIND 2 CONNECTORS FOR THE TOP PART OF THE NET TO MAKE IT WORK THE WAY I WANT IT TOO. THAT WILL NOT BE A PROBLEM. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Sure prevents groceries from falling from the back. I would have given it 5 stars, but it is very hard to pull on the stretch across the back of my Durango. A piece of plastic broke off of the top net corner. Otherwise, does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Took me less than 2 mins to set up, study yet flexible enough. Very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cjd

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Sometimes it slips off but not often . So much easier than without a net for sure. We can stack stuff without it falling out when we open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Trunk Organization made easy
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my first suv and was looking for something that would help to keep things upright and provide some organization without taking up too much trunk space. Using to store grocery reuseable bags etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lori O

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed - Screws were missing from the package
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but sounds like product inspection is lucking, screws were missing from the package.
customer_reviews.author: from Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Net for trunk
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my truck's suv. No more messy groceries! Extremely easy to install. Would most certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elsy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: A quality product at a great price! It fits my 2016 Holden Commodore Vf2 SS (Chevrolet SS) perfectly, and keeps things neat and tidy in the boot. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It is so nice not having to worry about anything falling out when I open the back end!! Seems to be of great quality, I bought it for my 2017 Nissan Murano and it fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Jules64

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to install and very useful for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product seems secure enough
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Wish the screws were self tapping to go into the car frame.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly for my 2013 Nissan Pathfinder. No more grocery items rolling around!!! Also helps keep a big bulky stroller in place. Very pleased with product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: One side clip broke off immediately, but am still able to use net with a little "rigging." Net works as expected and still holding up after 8 months of hard use.
customer_reviews.author: RedBetty

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to assemble and remove when needed
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to assemble and remove when needed. Perfect fit for my 2007 GMC Acadia. Definitely recommend it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This really helps manage clutter and keep stuff at the back of the car from hitting the door. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayne

product_meta.title: lebogner Trunk Storage Net Car Trunk Organizer, Mesh Net Hammock Cargo Storage Vehicle Organizer with 3 Mounting Options, Premium Quality Universal Fit Car Organizer
product_meta.description:
Need something to help you organize your travel necessities of your car, pick up truck or SUV?
Would you like to get extra convenient storage space in your car?
Do you have a large, spacious trunk, but often find yourself with many items that need storing and organizing?
Do you want to keep the trunk of your car clutter free

 The Lebogner Trunk Storage Net is the answer!!!

Keep your all your travel necessities in your car neat and organized by storing everything you need in this premium quality trunk organizer.

The Lebogner Multipurpose Trunk Organizer Net is magnificently designed to suit the needs of every car, it has a space for everything you might need on long car trips and day to day outings, put one in the trunk and keep your trunk of your vehicle neat and clean...

Benefits Of Buying The LEBOGNER Trunk Storage Net…

★ Customized design fits in the Trunk of Most Vehicles. measuring 35” x 15” (90cm x 40cm).
★ Can stretch till 43” (110cm) to enable larger and bulkier objects to comfortably fit inside.
★ Big Compartment to store grocery items, travel accessories, sports gear, pet supplies, tools, toys, and emergency equipment.
★ Cargo net stretches around your stuff and you can cram even more things in it than ever before.
★ All required mounting hardware included for two installation options.
★ When not in use the organizer will fold flat for easy storage.
★ Premium high-quality mesh fabric material.
★ Water-resistant fabric for easy care.
★ 100% NO HASSEL Lifetime Guarantee - NO RISK TO YOU!


Hurry! Keep Your Car More Organized And Cleaner And Make Your Life More Easier By Adding This Amazing Lebogner Trunk Organizer To Your Cart Today!

Satisfaction Is 100% Guaranteed Or Your Money Back.

✓ The Trunk Storage Net is designed to provide the most storage space possible. The cargo net stretches around your stuff and you can cram even more things in it than ever before. Will also be adjustable to all sizes of trunks.

✓ You can store Sports Gear, Dog Supplies, Tools, toys, And Emergency Equipment in the organizer. It will keep the BackSeat Or Trunk of your car clutter free. When not in use the organizer will fold flat for easy storage.

✓ The Trunk Storage Net is measuring 35” x 15” (90cm x 40cm) and it can stretch till 43” (110cm) to enable larger and bulkier objects to comfortably fit inside. It’s designed to fit most vehicles simply hook it on and the net is ready to use, All required mounting hardware included for two installation options.
